name: RoundRobin Protocol
description: RoundRobin is an AMM-type (Automated Market Makers) decentralized reward protocol on the basis of Klaytn Network, and it rewards participants according to their contribution to protocol activation. Participants can contribute to the RoundRobin protocol by depositing tokens in the pool and providing liquidity. The tokens that are deposited by liquidity providers will be sent to RoundRobin's Factory Contract, and the tokens can be swapped immediately by AMM, not the trading order book.
